package.name: dynamixel_interface_driver
package.description: Driver for handling serial IO with the dynamixel series of servos. used by dynamixel_controller to handle all communications on a single serial port. The implementation of dynamixel_interface_driver is based on the Dynamixel SDK v3.4.1
package.license: CSIRO Open Source Software License Agreement (variation of the BSD / MIT License)
package.author: Tom Molnar
